## IGraphicsComponent.onBeforeUpdate() method

Invariant by entity for a given frame, called either once or entity count times before update, depending on update strategy.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBeforeUpdate(componentRenderer: TComponentRenderer, updateArg: TUpdateArg): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  componentRenderer | TComponentRenderer |  |
|  updateArg | TUpdateArg |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
